entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Estevan Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 p.m. PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.1Â°C

Observed at: Estevan Point 2:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 30 in the morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Rain at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
